name: Feature Creepers
description:
Feature Creepers

Choose which feature you allow to be implemented and fight off the others in this hectic horror-themed game of defence.

A game created in <2 days for the Epic Game Jam 2017

Controls

MOVE with W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys
ATTACK with Left Click
INTERACT (gates, treasure chests, etc.) with Right Click or E
JUMP with Space Bar

Credits Xavier Ekkel Project Lead / Code WebsiteTwitter Bram van Elderen Code WebsiteTwitter Angela He Art WebsiteTwitter Travis W. Hendrix Sound Design WebsiteTwitter Josh T. Composer Website

NOTE: for downloadable versions, please play in 16:9 resolution (e.g. 1920x1080 or 960x540)!
